channel.title: reading on Morten Dæhli Aslesen
channel.description: Recent content in reading on Morten Dæhli Aslesen

item.title: Reading list
item.description: This is a curated list of reading material and code projects that I enjoy and recommend to others: Coding philosophy Twelve-factor app Architecture Patterns with Python by Harry Percival, Bob Gregory Test-Driven Web Development with Python by Harry Percival Python: Functional programming HOWTO by A. M. Kuchling Awesome scalability An updated and organized reading list for illustrating the patterns of scalable, reliable, and performant large-scale systems. The C4 model for visualising software architecture - Context, Containers, Components, and Code General tech Stop Emailing Like A Rube - Jeffery Paul Security Cybersecurity readings Projects General Advent of Code Web HUGO - The world’s fastest framework for building websites Streamlit - A faster way to build and share data apps Machine learning Explainable AI with Shap - Scott Lundberg Forecasting at scale with Facebook Prophet Featuretools Featuretools is a python library for automated feature engineering.
